query: I need assistance in designing a week-long travel plan for two, starting from Dallas and covering three cities in Pennsylvania. The trip will run from March 3rd to March 9th, 2022 and our budget is set to $9,300. For our accommodations, we are specifically looking for entire rooms.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Pittsburgh,Latrobe,Harrisburg]
